author: Anthony
text: I received my shoes in a timely manner the problem was that I paid almost double the price for them. The shoe had just dropped that day. I get it that you're in business for profits but that's a bit much.
title: To expensive

author: Sabena Alam
text: Nike shoes ordered for 50th birthday gift then cancelled days before required
title: Nike shoes ordered for 50th birthday…

author: Mel
text: My retro 1 rebellionaire's the right shoe on both pair is a shade darker on the toe the light grey don't match.  And one pair 1 of the front holes is not completely punched out right shoe as well.Size 13 Its as the shoe's weren't made in the same factory.
title: My retro 1 rebellionaire's the right…

author: Ashley
text: My order was supposed to be here today. I ordered on the 11th and it’s the 29th and my shoes haven’t even got to stockX yet. If you want your shoes to arrive on time I’d suggest not getting them through here.
title: Not happy

author: Deyana
text: I ordered 3 pair of shoes on the same day. I received 2 the same week but 1 pair almost a week and half later. Also didn’t receive any notifications until this week about the shoe
title: I ordered 3 pair of shoes on the same…

author: Zaria
text: The company you guys partner with for deliveries need some major intense training! My shoes were supposed to be here 4 days ago! But DHL has been having a hard time listening, and reading. I also don’t like how some of the smaller sizes are wayyyyy more expensive than the bigger sizes
title: The company you guys partner with for…

author: Xavier
text: Order took longer and shipping kept switching which was very confusing!
title: Order took longer and shipping kept…

author: Kerre
text: Never received package.
title: Never received package.

author: Tim
text: I did get my shoes
title: I did get my shoes

author: Hamza Kara
text: UPS have taken liability for the loss and notified you twice. I have notified StockX support and have been told for some reason they can't help. I have confirmed with UPS again and tried to relay this to StockX support. Sent 4 E-mails since 22/03/22 and have been totally ignored, yours is the first reply I've had since. Would love your feedback on that.
title: UPS have taken liability for the loss…

author: Ricky
text: my order got cancelled twice after being accepted.
title: Didn’t get my order twice.

author: Asia
text: Process take to long! You would have to order your shoes a month in advance.
title: Process take to long!

author: Ryuko Lau
text: My both attempts in purchasing products here have not been successful due to failed authenticity processes.  So I believe Stockx truly filters well for buyers.
title: Authentic

author: Charlie
text: …never received my order.
title: …never received my order.

author: Preciouse
text: I still haven’t received my Game but it is saying delivered I have sent in everything just trying to figure out what happened
title: I still haven’t received my Game but it…

author: Austin
text: They canceled my order
title: They canceled my oder

author: Hektic
text: Bought an Xbox series x as new, but when I opened the box and unwrapped the black wrap it came in I notice that one side had marks on it. I hope the ps5 I bought from stockx doesn't have any defects.
title: Bought an Xbox series x as new

author: Morgan
text: I ordered a pair of Yeezy Foam Runners, and after waiting a couple weeks for my package the correct package was never sent. Instead, I received 2 pairs of Yeezy slides in different sizes. During the authentication process, the items needs to be checked for accuracy as well as authentication. This was my first StockX order and it was extremely disappointing. After reaching out to customer service about the issue, the only solution is to return the package with no other rectification.
title: Inaccurate Product

author: Aisha
text: I did not appreciate the extra charges like a processing fee of 11.03 also shipping of 14.95 for my package to be left outside of my building where they could have been stole. Very disappointed will shop with a more responsible vender going forward.
title: I did not appreciate the extra charges…

author: DC
text: Shoe size was misleading. Was abbreviated by shoe name and not by the size area, and without returns was costly. Will no longer be buying from stock x.
title: Shoe size was misleading
